title: Corrupt go.go1.linux-386.tar.gz
body:
by **elimisteve**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

1. wget go.go1.linux-386.tar.gz
2. sha1sum go.go1.linux-386.tar.gz
3. tar xvf go.go1.linux-386.tar.gz

What is the expected output?

Everything but the "gzip: stdin: invalid compressed data--crc error" line and
the two error lines at the end (see below).

What do you see instead?

$ tar xvf go.go1.linux-386.tar.gz 
go/AUTHORS
go/CONTRIBUTORS
go/LICENSE
...
go/test/sinit.go
go/test/sizeof.go

gzip: stdin: invalid compressed data--crc error
go/test/solitaire.go
go/test/stack.go
...
go/test/varerr.go
go/test/varinit.go
go/test/zerodivide.go
tar: Child returned status 1
tar: Exiting with failure status due to previous errors


Which operating system are you using?

Ubuntu 10.04 on Linode


Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

Trying to install go1
